name: The Laverne Cowl - Mini
description:
Cozy. Chunky. Personalized Toddler & Child Infinity Cowl Scarf. Available in 12 colors [see 3rd photo]

Fits most 2-8 year olds, so this hand crocheted neckwarmer will be a winter essential for years to come.

Initial colors are: Black & White
★PLEASE INCLUDE CHILD'S FIRST INITIAL in NOTE TO SELLER during checkout★

Circumference: 21" [53 cm]
Depth: 8" [20cm]

The Laverne Cowl-Mini was designed, crocheted/knitted & constructed with love, by me, Finna.
***************************
OTHER STUFF YOU SHOULD KNOW
***************************
Care: Hand wash cold water, lay flat to dry.

All items are created in a smoke free, pet free environment.

★CAUTION★: Please use your best judgement and never leave your child unattended or lay down to sleep while wearing scarf.
✻✻✻✻✻✻✻✻✻✻✻✻✻✻✻✻✻✻✻✻✻
Each individual stitch is hand crocheted one by one, with care and love.

Each individual pick is stamped by hand, each letter, one by one. Like a fingerprint, it will be 100% unique.
